content: The strength of our business is reflected in our fiscal second quarter results with revenue of $354 million, an increase of 22% year-over-year and adjusted operating income of $77 million, up 38% as compared to the prior year period. Turning to results for the fiscal second quarter, total revenues were $353.7 million, as compared to $289.6 million in the prior year period with increases across all key revenue lines. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
